mapper.sql: epcp.id as id,epcp.property_name as property_name,epcp.category_id as category_id,epcp.property_type as property_type,epcp.material_type as material_type,epcp.is_input as is_input,epcp.is_checkbox as is_checkbox,epcp.is_required as is_required,epcp.data_order as data_order,epcp.data_status as data_status,epcp.remark as remark,epcp.create_time as create_time,epcp.create_user as create_user,epcp.update_time as update_time,epcp.update_user as update_user

epcpv.id as value_id,epcpv.property_value_name as value_property_value_name,epcpv.property_id as value_property_id,epcpv.category_id as value_category_id,epcpv.data_order as value_data_order,epcpv.data_status as value_data_status,epcpv.remark as value_remark,epcpv.create_time as value_create_time,epcpv.create_user as value_create_user,epcpv.update_time as value_update_time,epcpv.update_user as value_update_user
mapper.select: select ,epc.category_name,emt.material_type_name,emt.is_capacity_material AS is_capacity_material FROM erp_product_category_property epcp INNER JOIN erp_product_category epc ON epc.id = epcp.category_id AND epc.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_material_type emt ON emt.id = epcp.material_type AND emt.data_status = 1 where epcp.id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND epcp.data_status = 1

SELECT category_main.*
,emp.is_capacity_material AS is_capacity_material FROM( select
from erp_product_category_property epcp
and category_id = #{maps.categoryId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
and data_status = 1
ORDER BY data_order DESC ) category_main LEFT JOIN erp_product_category_property_value epcpv on category_main.id = epcpv.property_id LEFT JOIN erp_material_type emp ON category_main.material_type = emp.id
and epcpv.category_id = #{maps.categoryId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
and epcpv.data_status = 1
order by category_main.data_order DESC,epcpv.data_order DESC

SELECT category_main.*
FROM( select DISTINCT
from erp_product_category_property epcp INNER JOIN erp_product_sku_property mpsp ON epcp.id = mpsp.property_id AND mpsp.data_status = 1 AND mpsp.is_sku = 1
and mpsp.product_id = #{maps.productId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
and epcp.data_status = 1
ORDER BY data_order DESC ) category_main INNER JOIN erp_product_category_property_value epcpv on category_main.id = epcpv.property_id AND epcpv.data_status = 1 INNER JOIN erp_product_sku_property mpsp ON epcpv.id = mpsp.property_value_id AND mpsp.data_status = 1 AND mpsp.is_sku = 1
and mpsp.product_id = #{maps.productId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
and epcpv.data_status = 1
order by category_main.data_order DESC,epcpv.data_order DESC
SELECT FROM erp_product_category_property epcp WHERE epcp.property_name = #{propertyName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND epcp.category_id = #{categoryId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND epcp.data_status = 1
SELECT FROM erp_product_category_property epcp WHERE epcp.category_id = #{categoryId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND epcp.data_status = 1
